Service Details: - Before Care provides a gentle start to a child's day, a healthy breakfast, a variety of activities, including crafts, games, colouring and outdoor play- After Care provides students with the opportunity to have a snack, play indoors and outdoors, partake in unique crafts, projects and games, as well as read and catch up on homework
Hours: Before Care:  Mon-Fri: 7:00am - 8:30am @ $115/month (subsidy accepted)After Care:  Mon-Fri: 2:30pm - 5:45pm @ $225/month (subsidy accepted)
Dates: School year; closed Statutory Holidays and Pro-D days
How to Apply: Registration for these programs can be done online at www.kelowna.ca/parks-recreation/programs-registration, by phone at 250.469.8800 or in person at the Parkinson Recreation Centre.
Address & Map: Watson Road Elementary School475 Yates RdKelowna, BC     V1V 1R3View MapQuest Map
Former Name: Recreation, Parks and Culture, Active Communities
